content: the til designed by lisa di fruscia for sonder yarn co t h e t i l * is a beautiful and versatile accessory created by knitting two elongated triangles in modular fashion after knitting the first one the second one is attached to the first as you go there are no short row in this pattern just simple increases and decreases and a clever joining technique when finished fold the shawl along the center seam and decide which colour you re in the mood to wear forward that day * n the reservoir of all possible opportunities still available to you at this point in your life from the dictionary of obscure sorrows by john koenig sonder yarn co | sonderyarnco com | @sonderyarnco | #sonderyarnco the til | page 2 yarn sunday morning 4 ply 75% bluefaced leicester 25% masham 395 m 432 y / 100 g 2 skeins c1 shown in under the duvet 2 skeins c2 shown in fresh sheets needles size 4 mm us 6 60 cm / 24 circular needles - or size needed to obtain gauge notions blocking wires and pins - optional gauge 24 sts and 49 row = 10 cm / 4 in garter after wet blocking dimensions 206 cm x 84 cm 81 x 33 abbreviations c1 colour 1 c2 colour 2 co cast on k knit k2tog knit two stitches together decrease kfb knit into the front then the back of the same stitch increase ktbl knit through the back loop lh left-hand rh right-hand rs right side sl1pwyif slip_stitch purlwise with yarn in front ssk slip 2 sts knitwise one at a time then slip those stitches purlwise back to the left hand needle and knit both stitches together through the back loop decrease st s stich es ws wrong side yo yarn over © sonder yarn co 2022 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only the til | page 3 panel a with c1 co 6 sts set-up row row 1 rs knit row 2 ws k5 sl1pwyif row 3 ktbl k to last st kfb 7 sts row 4 k2 yo k1 k2tog k1 sl1pwyif main body row 1 rs ktbl k to last st kfb 1 st increase d row 2 ws k2 yo k to last 4 sts k2tog k1 sl1pwyif repeat row 1-2 a total of 220 times bind off on rs now that you have completed panel a you will knit panel b and attach it to panel a as you go the join happens at the beginning of every rs row by inserting the rh needle from front to back into the yo along the lh selvedge edge of the rs of panel a please refer to the photographs at right for a step by tutorial on how to join note that the last photo shows how the tip comes together by sewing in the ends panel b with c2 co 6 sts set-up row row 1 rs knit
